# Annotated time series

[An example with Twitter, using Beijing pollution data](http://brainchronicle.blogspot.co.uk/2012/07/twitter-analysis-of-air-pollution-in.html). There was a [pollution peak](http://brainchronicle.blogspot.fr/2013/01/air-quality-analysis-from-beijing.html) in January 2013. The city [looks like](http://kateoplis.tumblr.com/post/40555052298/nope-this-is-not-a-still-from-blade-runner-its) *Blade Runner*.
